pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.2: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā adhovāte aṭṭhāsi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.5: “ādiyantu kho bhikkhuniyo udakasuddhikan”ti, mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.6: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.9: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:6.10: “bhagavatā udakasuddhikā anuññātā”ti atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyantī muttakaraṇe vaṇaṃ akāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ āroceti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī atigambhīraṃ udakasuddhikaṃ ādiyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:8.1: “Udakasuddhikaṃ pana bhikkhuniyā ādiyamānāya dvaṅgulapabbaparamaṃ ādātabbaṃ. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc5:12.2: samphassaṃ sādiyantī antamaso kesaggamattampi atikkāmeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
